heading: User Research & Discovery
text: We started by shadowing field workers in three different regions to understand their daily workflows and pain points with existing tools.

heading: Offline-First Design
text: Designed a sync system that lets workers complete tasks without connectivity and seamlessly uploads data when back online.

heading: Iterative Prototyping
text: Built and tested paper prototypes with field workers before moving to high-fidelity designs. Three rounds of testing refined the core task flows.

heading: Developer Interviews
text: Conducted 15 interviews with developers at various skill levels to understand onboarding friction and documentation gaps.

heading: Information Architecture
text: Restructured the docs site navigation based on card-sorting exercises and tree testing with target users.

heading: API Playground
text: Designed an interactive API explorer that lets developers test endpoints directly in the browser before writing code.
